H

hasWeapon(String) - Method in class main.java.questfortheabodeth.characters.Player
Checks whether or not the player has the given weapon
HealthBar - Class in main.java.questfortheabodeth.hud
The HealthBar class is based in a character health of 100 This 100 points is divided into 20 sections each 5 pixels wide
HealthBar(Player) - Constructor for class main.java.questfortheabodeth.hud.HealthBar
Creates a new Health bar for the player
HealthBoost - Class in main.java.questfortheabodeth.powerups
Health pickups increase the players current health up to a maximum of 100 points
HealthBoost(int, int) - Constructor for class main.java.questfortheabodeth.powerups.HealthBoost
Creates a new health booster
healthProperty() - Method in class main.java.questfortheabodeth.characters.Character
Returns the health of this character as a read only property This means that the health can onyl be increased and decreased through the relevant methods
Helper - Class in main.java.questfortheabodeth
Contains functions that are required in multiple places throughout the game and do not modify the games state but instead perform caclulations.
Helper() - Constructor for class main.java.questfortheabodeth.Helper
 
HighscoreMenu - Class in main.java.questfortheabodeth.menus
A highscore menu that reads the most recent highscores and displays them on the screen
HighscoreMenu(RenderWindow) - Constructor for class main.java.questfortheabodeth.menus.HighscoreMenu
Creates a new highscore menu
Highscores - Class in main.java.questfortheabodeth
The Highscores class keeps track of all te highscores in the game.
Highscores() - Constructor for class main.java.questfortheabodeth.Highscores
Creates a new highscores object
hit(int) - Method in class main.java.questfortheabodeth.characters.Player
Damages the player for the amount given.
HudElements - Class in main.java.questfortheabodeth.hud
Brings together all the relevant HUD elements and allows them to be drawn to the screen as part of one call
HudElements(Player, HealthBar, MiniMap, WeaponWheel, AmmoCount) - Constructor for class main.java.questfortheabodeth.hud.HudElements
Creates a new HUD elements object
